name: Web Development
details: HTML. HTML or HyperText Markup Language is the foundation of web development that every developer needs to be familiar with. A popular skill for web developers, it is the 2nd most commonly used language in 2020, according to a survey by Stack Overflow.

name: Java
details: Java is a multi-platform, object-oriented, and network-centric language that can be used as a platform in itself. It is a fast, secure, reliable programming language for coding everything from mobile apps and enterprise software to big data applications and server-side technologies

name: Python
details: Python is a computer programming language often used to build websites and software, automate tasks, and conduct data analysis. Python is a general-purpose language, meaning it can be used to create a variety of different programs and isn't specialized for any specific problems

name: Machine Learning
details: Machine learning (ML) is the study of computer algorithms that learn without being explicitly programmed by humans. It is a subset of artificial intelligence (AI). Although ML algorithms start with basic instructions from their human designers, they learn and make predictions on their own.

name: C++
details: C++ is one of the world's most popular programming languages. C++ can be found in today's operating systems, Graphical User Interfaces, and embedded systems. C++ is an object-oriented programming language which gives a clear structure to programs and allows code to be reused, lowering development costs

name: Android App
details: Android software development is the process by which applications are created for devices running the Android operating system. Google states that 'Android apps can be written using Kotlin, Java, and C++ languages' using the Android software development kit (SDK), while using other languages is also possible
